price: Qiyaamaan dhuftuudha; ishee keessa mamiin hin jiru. Rabbiin kanneen qabriilee keessa jiran (hunda) ni kaasa.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-sāʿata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-anna al-laha yabʿathu man fī al-qubūri
